page.title: 15RAYDON,SHELLEY GARDEN CLUB
page.content: This club has 92 members who pay 1 pound per year.Monthly meetings are held on the first Thursday of each month starting at 7.30p.m. and ending at9.30p.m.For 9 of these meetings a guest speaker is invited to give a talk nd slide presentation on any gardening g subject.One meeting is replaced by an annual flower and vegetable show and one meeting is used for the Annual General Meeting.The remaining meeting usually December is a social meeting with a quiz or talk on holidays.At all meetings ther are refreshments,a raffle and a plant stall. Two shows are held each year,one in Spring for members only of daffodils and tulips or alternate years sweet peas and roses and an Annual Home Produce Show open to any resident of the villages.This attracts 400-500 entries to win several silver cups.
